title: Community Beach Cleanup
description: Join fellow students for a shoreline cleanup followed by coffee at the marina. Gloves, bags, and refreshments provided.

title: Latte Lounge Study Circle
description: Drop in to share notes and study together. Seating map is posted in chat each week.

title: Night Market Pop-up
description: Food trucks, live music, and local artisans lighting up Pine Avenue for one night only.

title: Shoreline Cycle Loop
description: Casual bike ride along the coast with a stop for smoothies at the five-mile mark.

title: North Long Beach Art Walk
description: Coordinate carpools and share must-see installations for the art walk about 10 miles north.

title: Foothill Trail Run
description: Morning trail run through the foothills about twenty miles inland. Expect moderate elevation gain.

title: Green Tech Expo
description: Hands-on demos of campus sustainability projects, electric mobility, and zero-waste startups.

title: Recreation Park Pickup Soccer
description: Saturday morning co-ed soccer scrimmage. All skill levels welcome - bring a light and dark shirt.

title: Sunrise Photo Walk
description: Meet on the bluff before dawn to capture golden hour along the shoreline. Bring a tripod if you have one.

title: Millennium Celebration
description: Y2K-themed throwback meetup to celebrate the turn of the century.

title: Sunrise Switchback Trek
description: Tempo hike up Signal Hill with mobility and breathing drills at each lookout.

title: Harbor Tempo Paddle
description: Stand-up paddle relay along Shoreline Marina. Includes drills for balance and cadence.

title: Catalina View Trail Run
description: 4-mile rolling trail with negative split pacing and parachute sprints at the finish.

title: Signal Hill Stair Circuit
description: 90-minute stair intervals alternating with resistance band stations.

title: Sunset Pickleball Picnic
description: Casual doubles ladder plus mobility cooldown and picnic potluck.

title: Belmont Beach Interval Ride
description: Sunrise bike sprints with sand plyo finishers next to the pier.

title: Lagoon Recovery Walk
description: Low-impact walk + stretch along Colorado Lagoon boardwalk with breathing cues.

title: Alpine Ruck Prep
description: Weighted-pack laps at Recreation Park with hill surges and cadence cues.

title: Bay Kayak Ladders
description: Interval kayak sprints across Alamitos Bay with partner spotting and form feedback.

title: Campus Sandbag Relay
description: Team relay across upper campus with sled pushes and sandbag carries at each stop.

title: Moonbeam Trail Hike
description: Night hike with reflective markers, headlamp safety check, and cocoa at the overlook.

title: Aquarium Plaza HIIT Lab
description: Bodyweight plus battle-rope intervals next to the aquarium lawn with live DJ mix.

title: Dune Dash Conditioning
description: Soft-sand repeats near the Peninsula roller path with sled drags and agility ladders.

title: Trail Snack Draft Board
description: Rank your go-to trail snacks. Winner brings a bulk bag to the next hike.

title: Switchback Pace Accountability
description: Post screenshots of your hill repeats—no filters, just sweaty honesty.

title: Foam Roller Emergency Channel
description: Drop your sore spots + best mobility clips before the next long run.

title: Peak Photo Thread
description: Share your best summit selfies, panoramas, or failed drone shots.

title: Ridgeline Weather Watch
description: Live thread for wind + cloud updates before every dawn workout.

title: Portside Rower Swap
description: Call dibs on the ergs and share your custom workouts for rainy days.

title: Llama Pack Logistics
description: The goofiest pack list wins bragging rights for the semester showcase.

title: CSULB Photo Walk (Media Stress Test)
description: Sample pin used to verify the three-photo upload limit. Snaps of the Pyramid, Japanese Garden, and campus interiors taken during the beta photo walk.

title: Broken Texture QA Lounge
description: Intentionally references missing image assets so the UNKNOWN_TEXTURE fallback is easy to test from the debug navigator.
